\u2022 The App is intended for get your identification that will use to identify the user.
\u2022 You agree to use the App only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms and all applicable laws and regulations.

\u2022 You may need to create an account to access certain features of the App. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

\u2022 The App and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by SingNaSabi and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws.

\u2022To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, SignNaSabi shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (a) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the App; (b) any conduct or content of any third party on the App; (c) any content obtained from the App; and (d) unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort (including negligence), or any other legal theory, whether or not we have been informed of the possibility of such damage.

\u2022 We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.
\u2022 These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Philippines, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
\u2022 If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at reignmondizon93@gmail.com
Basic level American Sign Language (ASL) involves learning essential signs, hand shapes, and basic grammar to communicate effectively
Advanced ASL instruction includes teaching school personnel, covering school terms, subject areas, trade industries, and more.
Advanced Level 1 ASL includes training on religious vocabulary and Bible terminology. This helps users communicate effectively about faith.
